name: Geared for Fear Alpha
description:
The current version of this game is still missing sound and other basic features.

Geared for Fear combines car combat with the character variety of fighting games. Like a fighting game character, each vehicle has a distinct set of attacks and other abilities.

Twelve rival criminals chase a money truck. Attack the truck, or kill competitors, to take the riches.

Controls:

DriveWASDLeft stick + triggersWeaponsArrow keysABXYDriftSpaceLBBoostShiftRBRespawnRSelectQuitEscStart
